title: Add management team info, WhatsApp contact, and course images

requirements.summary: Display management team names in the footer section
acceptanceCriteria: Management team names appear in the footer
Names are displayed as 'Aruna Mahajan' and 'Mahesh Gujrati'
Footer section is visible on all pages

file_operations.description: Add management team section to the existing footer. Include 'Management Team:' label followed by 'Aruna Mahajan' and 'Mahesh Gujrati' names. Style consistently with the warm educational theme and ensure visibility across all role-based dashboards.

requirements.summary: Add WhatsApp contact number in footer Contact Us section
acceptanceCriteria: Contact Us section displays WhatsApp number 7330202733
Number is formatted for easy readability
Contact information is accessible on all pages via footer

file_operations.description: Add Contact Us section to the footer with WhatsApp number 7330202733. Format the number for readability (e.g., +91 733 020 2733 or similar). Include appropriate icon or label for WhatsApp contact. Ensure consistent styling with footer theme.

requirements.summary: Add unique images for each course and display them in course cards
acceptanceCriteria: Each course has a distinct, visually appealing image
Images are displayed in course cards on CourseList and EnrolledCourses components
Images match the theme and level of each course (Basic, Advanced, Super Advanced)
Images are properly sized and responsive

file_operations.description: Add course images to the course card display. Map course IDs to generated image assets: use frontend/public/assets/generated/basic-intuition.dim_400x300.png for Basic Intuition course, frontend/public/assets/generated/advanced-intuition.dim_400x300.png for Advanced Intuition course, and frontend/public/assets/generated/super-advanced-intuition.dim_400x300.png for Super Advanced Intuition course. Add image element above or beside course title with proper responsive sizing and aspect ratio preservation.

Add course images to enrolled course cards using the same mapping as CourseList: frontend/public/assets/generated/basic-intuition.dim_400x300.png for Basic Intuition, frontend/public/assets/generated/advanced-intuition.dim_400x300.png for Advanced Intuition, and frontend/public/assets/generated/super-advanced-intuition.dim_400x300.png for Super Advanced Intuition. Ensure consistent card layout with CourseList component including responsive image sizing.

Create utility module that maps course IDs or names to their corresponding image paths. Export a function or constant object that returns the correct workspace path (frontend/public/assets/generated/<filename>.dim_400x300.png) for each course: Basic Intuition, Advanced Intuition, and Super Advanced Intuition. This centralizes image path logic for reuse across CourseList and EnrolledCourses components.
